attributes.action: Bring in the universal basic income to enable the UK to flourish post Brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
Basic income is an income unconditionally granted to all on an individual basis, without means test or work requirement.

Reasons to support the basic income, basic income will;

1) help us rethink how & why we work.

2) contribute to better working conditions.

3) downsize bureaucracy.

4) make benefit fraud obsolete.

5) help reducing inequalities.

6) provide a more secure and substantial safety net for all people.

7) contribute to less working hours and better distribution of jobs.

8) reward unpaid contributions.

9) strengthen our Democracy.

10) be a fair redistribution of technological advancement.

11) end extreme financial poverty.

From http://basicincome.org.uk/reasons-support-basic-income/
attributes.background: As Cameron said we were trusted with this decision, give us the freedom and opportunity to ensure a brighter future. Truly trust in our creativity, arts, engineering, science and the British spirit of resilience, tolerance and ingenuity to bring us into a bright and hopeful future.
